nodes.text: The planet Daltarri was a terrestrial world located in the galaxy. It was covered in plant life which was the home of the plant-based Daltarri species.

During the Clone Wars, Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker visited the world on behalf of Supreme Chancellor Palpatine, delivering plant seeds as a good-will gesture. He cut the diplomatic visit short to aid his master, Obi-Wan Kenobi and several other Jedi who were trapped on board the Starcrusher decoy.
